sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen : onClick()
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit : toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit -> AnimalState : changeState()
AnimalState -> HomeScreen : updateUI()
HomeScreen -> AnimalTextWidget : update()
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed by the AnimalCubit. When the user clicks on the animal text, the AnimalCubit toggles the state between Cat and Dog, updating the AnimalState, which in turn updates the UI.
navigation_flow: The app consists of a single screen: HomeScreen. There is no navigation between different screens.
